info.author: Fredrik Lundh
info.description:
The ElementSoup module is a (slightly experimental) wrapper for Leonard
Richardson’s robust BeautifulSoup HTML parser, which turns the BeautifulSoup
data structure into an element tree. The resulting combo is similar to
ElementTidy, but a lot less picky. And therefore, a lot more practical. Which is
good.
info.keywords: BeautifulSoup, ElementTree, ElementSoup, Parsers, HTML, XML
info.name: ElementSoup
info.summary: ElementTree wrapper for BeautifulSoup HTML parser
info.html_description: The ElementSoup module is a (slightly experimental) wrapper for Leonard Richardson’s robust BeautifulSoup HTML parser, which turns the BeautifulSoup data structure into an element tree. The resulting combo is similar to ElementTidy, but a lot less picky. And therefore, a lot more practical. Which is good.
